title: PACON - 103031 Pacon Tru-Ray Heavyweight Construction Paper, Festive Red, 9" x 12", 50 Sheets - 103431
description: Heavyweight 100% vat-dyed sulphite paper has longer, stronger fibers which is tough enough to take scoring, folding and curling without cracking and tearing. Its superior fade-resistance keeps projects brighter and fresher longer. Acid free for less fade. 50% recycled fiber content and recyclable.
